data.title: News
data.meta_description: The latest Alberta government news announcements.
data.text:
Latest news

After a long summer, drivers need to be extra careful in school zones and around buses as children head back to school.

Recovery efforts continue to support the return of Jasper residents.

Alberta’s government will launch a study to examine the feasibility of a new reservoir east of Red Deer to help fight drought and support communities.

Recovery efforts continue to support the return of Jasper residents. Highway 93 is now open with no stopping along the way.
